title: Leveled up and didn't recieve a capsule?
body: Assuming this is a bug since I didn't see any updates on level up capsules being random now. Is this connected to the notifications and gifting not working properly?

replies.body: While I was checking your level ups and hextech history, I actually noticed that it seemed like you hadn't gotten the last two level up capsules for 38 and 39. Got those added for ya, but if this happens again please reach out to our game team in a ticket so that they can track and fix this as quickly as possible!
Any chance you could do the same for my lvl 28 rewards that I didnt receive as of 3 hours ago.. thanks
Me too please for level 45 :( I wanna buy a new champion.
I assume this is a glitch and will be fixed then? I've been waiting 2 days for one capsule so far
I leveled up to 15 and didn't get my capsule either.
This just happened to me too! From level 33 to 34 as well! :(

Happened too me twice now but the first time I received a capsule after the next game I played, still awaiting a second, but yes its a bug and the capsule will show up eventually, servers are most likely flooded as the levelling system has just gotten much bigger then it ever was, but rewards will come if it doesn't work A. just wait and maybe it will come in a few minutes or after a game, B. Log out and Relog in **After** a few minutes {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I tried relogging several times and waited 18 hours. Still no capsule.

I have waited 24 hours and haven't received mine yet either but they added a bug problem at the top and I think that's the issue right now because it reads "Issue with sending and receiving gifts" so I'm thinking they have to gift the capsules and that's the issue? only thing I can think of {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Happened to me with level 37 to level 38.
This just happened to me. Level 34 to 35 and received no Hero Capsule. Also, support site not allowing me to make a ticket.

same just moments ago
From level 33 to 34
I suppose its just a bug that happened today. Cause it happened to me just now.{{item:3070}}
Same here today. Leveled up from 33 to 34 and no rewards.
I had the same issue. Went from level 33 to 34 and didn't receive a capsule
Happened to me on several accounts, GET USED TO IT.
